ComicInfo.Title: Crazy
ComicInfo.Summary:
"CRAZY"
Robyn and Marian have taken on their fair share of strange cases... but nothing could prepare them for their favorite band coming to them with this. Katie Graves, lead singer of Novela Kiss, has been acting weird as hell... and the band thinks that she's possessed. Robyn is on the case!
